about_the_game:
Embark on a grim adventure in a realm overshadowed by malevolent forces in "Day of Judgement," a dark fantasy action roguelike, with a mix of campaign map. As the revered leader of a valiant guild comprising of martyrs, keepers, and pilgrims, you are the last bastion of hope against the sinister demon invasion that threatens to engulf the realm in darkness.

Your guild stands resolute against the menace, with each heroic clash against the demonic invaders pushing back the tide of evil, one battle at a time. Your strategic decisions and fighting skills are the fulcrum on which the fate of the realm rests.

Harness the scarce resources generated by the beleaguered villages surrounding your guild's stronghold. Your judicious allocation and management of these supplies are crucial for bolstering your guild’s strength, upgrading your arsenal, and ensuring the survival of the innocent villagers.

As the demonic onslaught rages, the survival of the neighboring villages is intertwined with your guild’s fate. Upgrade Guilds buildings, improve Hunters and decimate the demon hordes to ensure the dawn of a new day in a realm yearning for salvation.

Experience the unique blend of intense combat and strategic meta-decisions in a darkly enchanting fantasy setting. The delicate balance between resource management and heroic combat is the crucible in which true leaders are forged. Can you weather the storm and restore hope in the "Day of Judgement"?

Prepare yourself. The final battle between good and evil looms. The Day of Judgement awaits!

name: Day of Judgment

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 710M or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Could probably benefit from one
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one

short_description: In Day of Judgement, a dark fantasy action roguelike bullet heaven, with Campaign Map. Lead a guild of heroes, wield enchanted swords, craft elixirs, and safeguard villages from a demon invasion. Your tactical mastery and combat skills will shape the fate of the realm.
